verbs.description: [ARG1: He] [V: is] [ARGM-TMP: now] [ARG2: a mere trivia footnote in history] -- [ARGM-ADV: mostly for insisting Trump weighs 239 pounds] !
He is now a [ARGM-ADJ: mere] [ARGM-ADJ: trivia] [V: footnote] [ARGM-LOC: in history] -- mostly for insisting Trump weighs 239 pounds !
[ARG0: He] is now a mere trivia footnote in history -- mostly for [V: insisting] [ARG1: Trump weighs 239 pounds] !
He is now a mere trivia footnote in history -- mostly for insisting [ARG0: Trump] [V: weighs] [ARG3: 239 pounds] !
